body.p:
Lexington Ky March 27th 1865
To His Excellency
Thos C Bramlette
Gov of Ky

Your petitioner presents to you that he was Indicted at the Feb term of the Fayette Circuit Court for Faro Dealing & has confesed Judgment in the sum of $500 & now asks your excellency to pardon said fine (Fees & costs excepted) he is a poor man & would ^be^ greatly distressed if compeled to pay the said fine, he promises not to be caught again

Fayette Cir Ct
vs
Charles Craig
$500,
Remitted 25th Mch 1865
